description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
14 Lloyd Square, Islington, London, WC1X 9AJ

TPO Reference
T1 – Lime of LBI TPO (No.371) 2007

PO Number
T080460

Work specifications
1 x Lime (T1) as detailed in LBI TPO (No.371) 2007
Fell to ground level and remove stump to facilitate replanting

Decision:
Approve Subject to conditions
decision_conditions: Within one planting season of the removal of the Lime a replacement heavy standard Small Leaved Lime, Hop Hornbeam, Chanticleer Pear or Field Maple shall be planted in a like for like or similar location subject to approval by the local authority.  The tree’s location, confirmation of the species, supplier and size shall confirmed to the Principal Tree Preservation Officer within 30days of the replacement tree having been planted and shall be the subject of a 5yr establishment guarantee.  Should an alternative replacement trees species be considered by the Local Planning Authority than those detailed above.  The Authority reserves the right reject any alternative proposals and insist on the release of the replacement tree condition by the planting of one of the tree species detailed above.
